title: Floridians Can Obtain Food Stamp Benefits If Their Power Went Out During Hurricane Irma?
subtitle: A series of Facebook rumors about food stamp benefits for post-Irma Florida residents have a grain of truth to them but elide important facts.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Florida residents affected by Hurricane Irma can receive $197 in food stamp benefits, but only if they can show that their homes lost power for more than two hours.
